trans-unit.source: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta i dati immagine restituiti da un decodificatore e accettati dai codificatori.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> provides additional functionality not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by providing access to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associated with a particular frame of an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> fornisce funzionalità aggiuntive non è definita da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> fornendo l'accesso per il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associata a un particolare fotogramma di un'immagine.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> also supports the writing of metadata information by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> supporta anche la scrittura di informazioni sui metadati utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> proprietà o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> returned from a decoder is always frozen.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> restituito da un decodificatore è sempre bloccato.

trans-unit.source: If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessaria una copia modificabile, è innanzitutto necessario creare una copia del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: Solo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] immagini in formato supporta frame multipli.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> oggetto per aprire un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] immagine e scrivere i metadati utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene o imposta un valore che rappresenta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> di base del contesto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> di base del contesto corrente.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando è sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene un insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> associati all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Insieme di sola lettura di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> associati all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> based on the supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> nuovo sulla base degli argomenti specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that is used to construct the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> utilizzato per costruire l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option is used.
trans-unit.target: Il `bitmapStream` può essere chiuso dopo la creazione del frame solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> viene utilizzata l'opzione cache.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> opzione cache consente di mantenere il flusso fino a quando non è necessario il frame.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> method to specify create and cache options.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> specificare metodo creare e memorizzare nella cache di opzioni.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> che identifica l'origine dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> from a given <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come costruire un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> da un determinato <xref:System.Uri>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> utilizzato per costruire questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Percorso della bitmap dal quale viene creato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti della memorizzazione nella cache per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> specificato, con l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> con l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Versioni e dipendenze](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: The source from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Origine da cui viene costruito l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Un'immagine in anteprima dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> risultante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> nuovo da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> specificato con la miniatura specificata.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> con un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> con l'anteprima specificata.

trans-unit.source: The stream from which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Flusso da cui viene costruito l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzioni utilizzate per creare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzione di memorizzazione nella cache utilizzata per creare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> nuovo da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> specificato, con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> opzione cache, se si desidera chiudere il `bitmapStream` dopo la creazione della bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache mantiene l'accesso al flusso fino a quando non è necessaria la bitmap e la pulizia viene gestita dal garbage collector.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Percorso della bitmap dal quale viene creato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzioni utilizzate per creare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzione di memorizzazione nella cache utilizzata per creare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> specificato, con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Percorso della bitmap dal quale viene creato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzioni utilizzate per creare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzione di memorizzazione nella cache utilizzata per creare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti della memorizzazione nella cache per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> specificato, con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> e <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> e <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Versioni e dipendenze](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> utilizzato per costruire questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Un'immagine in anteprima dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> risultante.

trans-unit.source: The metadata to associate with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Metadati da associare all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> associati a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> dato con l'anteprima specificata, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> da un dato oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> con l'anteprima specificata, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, which can be used to associate metadata with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, crea un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, che può essere usato per associare i metadati a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Metadata can only be added or edited using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I metadati possono solo essere aggiunti o modificati tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> se il file di immagine contiene abbastanza spazio per i nuovi metadati; in caso contrario, i metadati possono essere aggiunti mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> oggetto per aprire un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] immagine e scrivere i metadati utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the decoder associated with this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene il decodificatore associato con l'istanza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the thumbnail image associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: In caso di override in una classe derivata, ottiene l'immagine di anteprima associata a questo elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents a thumbnail of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> che rappresenta una miniatura dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> corrente.
